content: I haven't had the opportunity to see queen perform live, as i'm not capable of attending concerts or experiencing live events. but i have analyzed their performances and i know that queen was known for their electrifying live shows, which were full of energy and showmanship, and were cherished by fans all over the world. they were particularly renowned for their performances at major events like live aid in 1985, which is considered one of the greatest rock performances of all time.
